means: 充分满足，使厌腻( satiate的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: The girl was so satiated with bananas that she would not even look at one.
sentence.Network_cn: 这女孩吃香蕉吃腻了,见了它连看都不想看.

sentence.Network_en: She finished the meal and sat back with a satiated sigh.
sentence.Network_cn: 她用完餐，往椅背上一靠，心满意足地叹了口气。

sentence.Network_en: The Vengeance of Juno was not yet satiated.

PerfectNetExp.abs: GRE单词33-40 - 豆丁网 ... sate 使心满意足 satiated 充分满足的 satire 讽刺.
She was so satiated with bananas that she would not even look at one ., 她已吃腻了香蕉 , 她甚至连看都不想看一眼.

收藏查看语义饱和本词条缺少信息栏、名片图，补充相关内容使词条更完整，还能快速升级，赶紧来吧！ 看一个字久了会觉得不认识,这个现象其实很普遍。不仅是汉字，英语等其它语言的使用者也会出现“一个词看久了就认不出”的现象。甚至不仅在语言中，就连一幅熟人的照片、一个熟悉的地点，看久了之后都有可能会突然觉得陌生起来。[br/]　这个现象在西方被叫做Jamais vu。针对它的研究早在20世纪60年代就已开展。[br/]　一些学者用“语义饱和”（Semantic satiation）来解释这个现象。他们认为：[b
satiation 饱和satiation effect 满足效应satiety 餍足状态

entry.tran: 使满足;使充分享受;使过饱;使腻烦
entry.def: If something such as food or pleasure satiates you, you have all that you need or all that you want of it, often so much that you become tired of it.

example.ex: The dinner was enough to satiate the gourmets...
example.tran: 晚餐足以让这些美食家们大饱口福。

example.ex: The Edinburgh International Festival offers enough choice to satiate most appetites.
example.tran: 爱丁堡国际艺术节上活动丰富，大多数人都会尽兴而归。

auth_sentence.content: They found that starving fruit flies spent more time awake than satiated flies did.
auth_sentence.res_content: They found that starving fruit flies spent more time awake than satiated flies did.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They found that starving fruit flies spent more time awake than satiated flies did.

auth_sentence.content: Perhaps that is one of the reasons we can become satiated by solving problems only to become more depressed as a result.
auth_sentence.res_content: Perhaps that is one of the reasons we can become satiated by solving problems only to become more depressed as a result.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Perhaps that is one of the reasons we can become satiated by solving problems only to become more depressed as a result.

auth_sentence.content: He suggests that when we taste Splenda, the reward system becomes activated but not satiated.
auth_sentence.res_content: He suggests that when we taste Splenda, the reward system becomes activated but not satiated.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He suggests that when we taste Splenda, the reward system becomes activated but not satiated.
